She did not have much to say on Lee's actions, but rather on the voters in the district. My focus is on the constituents in teh district, and my goal is that they are all well looked after and have access to all the constituent services they need during this time of transition, said Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand ,( D) New York. Kirsten Gillibrand did work closely with Lee to craft legislation for the families of Flight 3407 victims. Eric Schmidt will step down as the CEO of Google in April, the company announced today via official blog post. Mr. Eric Schmidt will remain executive chairman and serve as adviser to Mr. Page and Sergey Brin , the other company co-founder and its president of technology, reports the New York Times.
